short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will help you to find the CID & PlaceID of the GMB page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed in mind for Google Street View publishers, 'GMB Page - CID & PlaceID Finder' is an essential Chrome plugin that simplifies the process of identifying the CID (Customer ID) and PlaceID of businesses on Google Maps, for the case when you can not create a tour in GoThru bcause the Google Map business search function does not return the business you are looking for.
